professional.description: Billie is a breakthrough Fintech startup in Berlin that aims to revolutionize small business financing.
responsibilities: Working on frontend for one of our products

professional.description: Formation is a Berlin-based startup developing a new communication and coordination tool for fast moving teams operating in and around large facilities. Formation leverages the earth's magnetic field to find indoor position and seamlessly switches to GPS as users move outdoors.
responsibilities: Creating and maintaining admin dashboard for managing the system
Defining tech stack, coding standards and conventions
Delivering first MVP to Berlin Tech Open Air 2018 which was available to 250 volunteer users on 8 000 square meters area and spread across 3 buildings with multiple floors
professional.technologies: React.js, Express.js, SASS/CSS, postgres, Realm, npm, git.

professional.description: Working on several e-commerce projects based on shopware: Cafe Royal, Delizio, Cremesso and Coffee Circle. After 3 years of working for Coffee Circle I became Frontend Team Lead and started introducing more microservices, tooling and developing environment improvements
responsibilities: Refactoring Coffee Circle code base to industry standard
Frontend implementation of design and rewrite of Cafe Royal code base to industry standard
Development of internal tools based on node.js and react.js
Decoupling components from Shopware into standalone services
Updating the developing environment and working on code sharing library
professional.technologies: JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, jQuery, Gulp, SASS/CSS, Smarty, Handlebars, npm, git.

professional.description: During my time in Task 36 I was involved in improving UI for a single page application. Most of my work was focused on creating fast Gantt charts (SVG based) and creating new onboarding wizard, as well as improving CSS styles and optimizing performance. When starting the page load times were around 30 seconds mark, after optimizations we went down to sub 2 seconds load time for double the size of displayed data.
During the internship I have worked on SelfTrackIO and Quiary. I was working in team with a backend developer and we developed new application to track data about personal health.
professional.technologies: JavaScript, jQuery, D3.js, dimple.js, LESS, Ruby on Rails, git.

personal.description: Website which was developed for my online gaming hobby. Website visitors can use it as information source and to check various states of games via API. It has started as basic scripts and then extended a bit to be useful to larger audience playing online games
personal.technologies: React.js, Node.js, Postgres, SASS/CSS, Webpack, hosted on Heroku

personal.description: Small npm package which can embed gists on React.js web applications. It was done as part of research how to deploy and maintain npm modules.

personal.technologies: React.js, SASS/CSS, Webpack, hosted on GitHub
